title: 我的MC出了什么问题？
author: Z51530066
txt_content:
打开所有的包都是这样[img]http://www.mcbbs.net/[/img]
    但如果把内存设置为1024的话就是下面的情况

      Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------

- Minecraft Version: 1.4.2
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_11, Oracle Corporation

replies.author: Z51530066
replies.txt_content: 是不是我少装了什么东西

replies.author: Z51530066
replies.txt_content: 我的显卡驱动没有错误啊

replies.author: Z51530066
replies.txt_content: 进入界面后还很卡，我记得我修改过BIOS里的高级设置的某些选项，是不是这个问题？

replies.author: Z51530066
replies.txt_content: 把贴子顶上去求人回答！
